frqParts.text:
You will participate in a simulated exchange of text-chat messages. The time you will have to write each response is indicated on the clock. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible.

You will have a conversation with Aoi Takahashi, a student at your sister school, about music.

Respond.
こんにちは。あなたの友達の間では、どんな音楽が人気がある？

Give your opinion.
音楽を聞くことのいい点は何だと思う？

Give your preference.
日本ではカラオケで歌うのが好きな人が多いんだけど、あなたもカラオケしてみたい？

Justify your opinion.
先生が音楽を聞きながら勉強するのはダメだって言うんだけど、どう思う？

Respond with details.
日本の音楽について、何か知っている？

Give at least one suggestion.
日本の高校生に聞いてほしい音楽を教えてくれる？

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
